attributes.action: CLAW BACK THE POWERS OF THE PM TO THE CHAMBER OF THE HOUSE OF COMMONS.
attributes.additional_details: It CANNOT be right that one man who is a congenital liar and one who cares nought for the people of the land to have the power to hold the population to ransom over membership of the EU.  MPs are voted for to represent the electorate so it is those MPs who, after consulting the people who voted for them who MUST HAVE THE POWER TO ORDER AN IN OUT EU REFERENDUM.  David Cameron does not have the honour, integrity, probity, nor just the basic downright honesty to be allowed to continue doing what he does.
